Description:
You come across a small group of smugglers sleeping on the shore of the lake. Their camp is in disarray and no guard has been posted. 

Upon closer inspection, you notice how haggard they are: frayed armor and clothing, chipped blades and nearly empty supply crates betray their vulnerability.

    "Name": "e_sen7_c2",
    "ReplyActionText": "Talk",

    "ReplyShowCard": "",
    "ReplyText": "You yell towards the group, making your presence known.",
    "SSRewardText": "You rouse the group from their slumber and ask how they came to pitch their camp so hastily on the lake's shore. \n\nTheir leader explains that they were traveling through the forest with their goods when they were ambushed by werewolves. The werewolves blocked the bridge they had planned to escape over, forcing the smugglers to divert into a cave under the bridge. Their convalescence in the cave was short-lived, as it is inhabited by all sorts of monsters.\n\nThe leader informs you that, regrettably, they were forced to leave some of their own behind. They are presumed dead, but he gives you his compass and tells you to follow it northeast towards the bridge. The cave is then slightly southeast of the bridge's western end. If any of their folk or supplies remain in the cave, maybe they can aid your party. His parting words are to warn you about a massive creature that they trapped in a branchwork cave segment in the north of the subterranean river.\n\nThe smuggler leader sighs, and then begins to organize his group to make the final trek back to Senenthia Castle.",
    "SSCRewardText": "",
    "FLRewardText": "",
    "FLCRewardText": "",

    "ReplyText": "You aggressively move towards the group and threaten to kill them all unless they give you their valuables.",
    "SSRewardText": "The smugglers acquiesce, letting you look through their meager supplies. Among other things, you find a compass laying on top of a map that seems to indicate the smugglers were either coming from or going to a cave under a nearby bridge.\n\nAs you leave, one of them mutters that he hopes you meet the same end as their last leader who surely died attempting to barricade in the monster which chased them out of the northern cave corridors.",
    "SSCRewardText": "The smugglers scatter, leaving behind all of their loot.\n\nAmong other things, you find a compass laying on top of a map that seems to indicate the smugglers were either coming from or going to a cave under a nearby bridge.\n\nThere is also a hastily scrawled note on the back of the map which reads: \"Boss barricaded the big beast in the branchwork cave using the goods. We need more men to retrieve them.\"",
    "FLRewardText": "The smugglers react more swiftly than you expected and prepare for combat.",
    "FLCRewardText": "You stumble during your assault, giving the smugglers ample time to prepare for combat. Not quite as sneaky as you thought you were, eh?",
